ygData.subject: Re: Paw Corpse Retrieval was Executioners Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: The necro is Ghanex Drah.  At level 15, he usually cons white or blue to me.  Our party Friday night (a druid, mage, enchanter, and myself a warrior) took him
ygData.messageBody:
The necro is Ghanex Drah. At level 15, he usually cons white or blue to
me. Our party Friday night (a druid, mage, enchanter, and myself a warrior)
took him out in about 30 seconds. Next time we went back, a funny thing
was happening. His own zombies and skeletons were attacking him...he came
running from his room with about a quarter health. We finished him off and
got the experience....anyone have any idea how this happened?


Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"

> ----------
> From: James Schuldes[SMTP:jgs@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 10:46 AM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Paw Corpse Retrieval was Executioners Axe
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> It was my bard char who died in there. She has a locate song so it's not
> all
> that lost - at least I think it's not lost :-) We went in and did not get
> too far. Some named gnoll - a dark necro? Anyways some one said it's the
> worst one of all and we got him pretty much first thing. Then he got us.
>
> It was the first time I had to leave a corpse out over night. But it was
> past midnight on Sunday (Monday morning) and I had to get some sleep for
> work - not having gotten any Fri & Sat both 4.30 am camps.
>
> "Split Paw....not as bad as BB..." (famous last words)
>
> When I get her back, my level 10 Warrior is gonna go back there and kick
> some gnoll butt!
>
> Snyak - level 10 Warrior
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jones, Brian [mailto:brian.jones@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 10:12 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Executioners Axe
>
> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
> Where in Paw did ya lose your corpse? I have
> been everywhere in that place and can give you some
> pointers. I successfully hid from Shaman Ren Rex
> when he was after me for almost an hour before I was
> able to make my escape.
>
>
> Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
> "Periissem ni periisem"
>

> > To get to see her, someone has to complete a quest: Head
> of Gnasher
> > Furgutt.
> > There is a named gnoll that needs to be killed and his
> head needs to be
> > given to the Captain of the Guards. He then dispatches
> the executioner
> > who
> > walks over to Fish's Ale and kills the barkeep who was
> Gnasher's partner
> > in
> > the illegal brewing operations.
> >
> > I happened to "be in the right place at the right time"
> and saw her in
> > action last night. Later on I got into "the wrong place
> at the wrong
> > time"
> > and spent the rest of the night trying to get my corpse
> from Paw. Have to
> > go back tonight and try some more <sigh>.
> >
> > Snyak.
> >
